short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will help you build a route in Google Maps by highlighting the required area with coordinates.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will help you build a route in Google Maps by highlighting the required area with coordinates. Now there is no need to manually insert each coordinate.
